reviewText: as advertised. good behind the scenes look at sturgis
Great dvd, well done. Shows Sturgis activties that you don't normally see on most dvd's, but you know happens from word of month.  Stormy does a great job covering the event.

Okay, Definitely for adult viewing only.  If you like Sturgis, motorcycles, and the Ladies, you won't regret buying this DVD.  The ladies are just as exiting and beautiful as the motorcycles and the event itself.  A MUST HAVE.
This was very interesting,because I am older and don't get to Sturgis very often, Just like being there,all you need is a cold beer to make it complete.

This is sort of a Stormy Does Sturgis, more than a film about the rally itself.  The Adult Film Star takes you around to a few locations, then spends the rest of her time doing what she does best. It is actually fairly well filmed, and great for boys night out in the Man Cave. I prefer the shower scene in this documentary to the one from Psycho...a lot. LOL!
Best sturgis video i seen lately. It is a little off the wall though. I would recommend it if you like women.

This dvd does show the more wild side of Sturgis. If your a fan of Stormy you will enjoy this and get to see more of her exposed. So yes this dvd is of an adult nature with music, girls and yes bikes. Sturgis never changes its a party year after year so even though this dvd is a bit outdated it still give stugis virgin an insight on what goes on in sturgis so check it out if you ever wonder about Sturgis and were thinkning about going.

This video is well organized, it has some colorful characters,but could use more. They keep it clean and not full of interviews of a bunch of drunks. Stormy Daniels does a good job of giving a documentery of activities. The women interviewed I think get to talk the most, guys just shrug and party on most of the time, normal. I think they could have did more on the activities on Main street and colorful characters along the drag. Not X rated at anytime, some boobs. Good video.

This is a good expose of the more "adult" side of the Sturgis experience. Definitely R-rated, it is a good look at the free-spirits who come to Sturgis to just let their hair down and do what they probably would never do at home.  2009 was my first Sturgis ride and although this video was made a few years earlier, it accurately shows what you can expect at Buffalo Chip and many of the clubs around Sturgis (especially when the sun goes down).  Unlike the scenes in this video, I was pleasantly surprised to find that the streets of Sturgis were fairly tame and more PG. You have to intentionly seek out these venues while in Sturgis, but they are definitely part of the total Sturgis experience.
